attributes.title: Donald Trumps app is NOT SAFE!!!
attributes.review: The app alway kicks me out.😒 It’s extremely glitchy, it makes u do the wrong things. It’s not even safe.  The app access ur phone a lot,location, data, google history and even photos.😳 SO STOP!  ✋🏽 Downloading this app before it access ur phone, 📱and u cannot stop this from HAPPENING either.

attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review: Hi my name is big boi Becky and this app is awful if I could give it 0 stars I would I am a 69 year old and this app is so disappointing I came here to worship big Cheeto boi and all I got was some disgusting imagery and that’s the least of it I could say way more but I don’t want to make my fingers bleed have a good day everyone and burn Cheeto boi

attributes.title: not very good, probably, the worst
attributes.review: all i wanted to do was make America great and all this app did was hack my contacts, insult my grandmother, send dead baby pictures to widows, take all the money from struggling veterans, and send obscene images to doctors and nurses. why is this allowed? who said this was okay? 0/10. Less than that.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app has some serious issues... not only did it scorch my eyes with its orange dusted looking Bigfoot like character when you open it, it basically made my finger bleed from the sheer download. Not only that, as soon as I looked up from this cesspool of an app, my dog got attacked by a roaming multicolored hippo with hypnotic eyes and monkey hands.

attributes.title: literally disgusting
attributes.review: this app is the worst app i have ever handled in my entire life. not only does it run HORRIBLY but it shows trump holding a fist at the beginning? first of all, that’s fake marketing because we ALL know he does not support black lives matter 🙄 that is a fake fist of solidarity. anyGAYS i do not recommend its horrible and awful

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app was so glitchy and constantly collapsed during simple daily usage. Not to mention, the user interface was horrible and so confusing for someone just trying to get the news. Overall, I simply didn’t enjoy one aspect of my experience.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I saw that Cheeto man made an app what I saw wasRepulsing he was nude and working out and while I saw this my son was right next to me and passed out 😵 hit his head on the phone I am disappointed 😔 and disgusted I would never download this app it has scarred him mentally and now has to go to therapy. ☹️☹️☹️😢😢😪😪  DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: UNSPEAKABLE🤢👹
attributes.review: I was on my way to get Dunkin’ Donuts coffee and I bumped into charli damelio my queen she was so nice and I just downloaded your app and then I showed her. It was DISGUSTING I saw a big orange Cheeto man and he was doing the renegade. Not only was I in shock but charli threw up and fainted. I had to go call the ambulance since her blood pressure was low from seeing something so horrendous. Do not Recommend ✨

attributes.title: Biden 2020
attributes.review: The USA has had the worst response to the pandemic in the world. As President Truman said the buck stops here. This administration has gross negligence, ignoring intel that could have saved lives earlier this year. Trump is the only president that can take a national crisis and divide our great nation instead of uniting us.  I am a registered republican, but there’s no way I will ever vote for Trump!

attributes.title: SO BAD
attributes.review: First off the moment i opened the app my eyes were carved out by justin bieber while he was wearing a fur suit. Then my own dog started shutting all over the carpet while trump himself smeared it all over the tv, it was absolutely disgusting. My own vagina started squirting juices into my brothers laundry basket. overall a horrible experience. Then my grandma died 🙄.
